meanings.definition: Including all the services or items normally expected or required.
meanings.sent1: The all-inclusive vacation package covered everything we needed for our trip.
meanings.sent2: The hotel offers an inclusive deal that includes meals and activities.
meanings.sent3: The inclusive party package had everything from decorations to music.
meanings.sent4: Her inclusive approach to teamwork made everyone feel valued and important.
meanings.sent5: The inclusive school environment welcomed students of all abilities with open arms.

meanings.definition: Including the stated limit or extremes in consideration or account.
meanings.sent1: The budget proposal was all-inclusive, accounting for every possible expense.
meanings.sent2: The survey was designed to be inclusive of all opinions, even the most extreme ones.
meanings.sent3: The inclusive guest list for the party included both the quietest and the loudest friends.
meanings.sent4: Her inclusive decision-making process ensured that all viewpoints were taken into account.
meanings.sent5: The inclusive approach to problem-solving considered even the most unlikely solutions.

meanings.definition: Including the limits or extremes in consideration or account.
meanings.sent1: The weather forecast was inclusive of the highest and lowest temperatures for the week.
meanings.sent2: The report was inclusive of all possible scenarios, from best to worst case.
meanings.sent3: The inclusive seating plan accounted for both the tallest and shortest guests.
meanings.sent4: Her inclusive perspective on the issue considered both ends of the spectrum.
meanings.sent5: The inclusive timeline covered all possible delays and advancements.
